page.title: 16LORNA'S HORSE
page.content: My horse is stabled at the Livery Stable throughout the year. I find this more convenient because of my interest in{SHOW JUMPING}and{HORSE {SHOWS.}Horses jump better and are kept fitter when off the grass. Also, when I am jumping at shows, which usually last about 3 days, the horse must be stabled and it is not good for it to be in the cold one night and in warmth the next. I travel all over Scotland and N.England to compete in show jumping competitions. These take place all year round. During the summer they are held outdoors and through the winter they are held in arenas. When we travel to these shows and stay overnight we live in our horsebox which is divided into a living area for us and an area for the horses.
